content: David, I couldn't agree more about prioritizing equity throughout this process. Specifically, some labs don't meet contemporary science standards, and our teachers often have limited flexibility when designing engaging lessons due to infrastructure constraints. Moreover, we notice significant disparities between schools, exacerbating existing achievement gaps among our student populations. By approving this proposal, we'll take a vital step towards providing equitable opportunities for every student to excel in STEM subjects and prepare them for an increasingly complex world.
